title: Nippon Koi Fish Farm, a serene aquatic haven
blurb: Selling Japanese Koi since 1980, outside of Japan.
description: Nippon Koi Fish Farm, established in 1980, specializes in selling exclusively Japanese Koi, making it a long-standing dealer outside of Japan. The farm offers a comprehensive range of koi-related goods suitable for both Koi and ornamental ponds. Visitors are welcome to explore the farm, which has incorporated sustainable vegetable planting to enhance and innovate its practices. A must-try is their unique Spinach Ice Cream! The farm provides an engaging experience for families interested in aquatic life and sustainable farming practices, making it an ideal destination for a family outing.
datetime_display: open to visits and have included sustainable planting of vegetables in its quest to continually enhance and innovate

title: Kok Fah Technology Farm: Witness farm technology
blurb: Family-owned business selling leafy vegetables for 40 years.
description: Kok Fah Technology Farm is a local family-owned business that has been selling leafy vegetables in Singapore for the past 40 years. The daily operations are managed by the 3rd and 4th generations of the family, including Mr. Wong Kok Fah and his three brothers, who took over from their father in 1979. The farm is open for tours and features a bustling weekend market on its premises. Visitors can witness technology in farming and sustainability practices. This farm offers an educational experience for families, showcasing modern agricultural techniques and promoting sustainable living.
datetime_display: open to visits and have included sustainable planting of vegetables in its quest to continually enhance and innovate

title: Kin Yan Agrotech Organic Agro-Food Activities
blurb: Engaged in agro-food related activities in Singapore.
description: Kin Yan Agrotech Pte Ltd is a company engaged in agro-food related activities in Singapore since 1997. Kin Yan is a farm free from pesticides, chemical and artificial fertilizers. We strongly believed in growing good foods that are great for everyone which are very real and organic, free from any form of artificial components. Open for tours and you can get your Mushroom DIY Growing Kit. Learn about organic farming practices and the importance of sustainable agriculture. The farm offers a unique opportunity to see how food is grown without the use of harmful chemicals. Visitors can participate in tours and purchase a Mushroom DIY Growing Kit to grow their own mushrooms at home.
datetime_display: Daily operations are run by the 3rd & 4th generation of the family, including Mr Wong Kok Fah and his three brothers who took over from their father in 1979

title: Qian Hu Fish Farm Integrated Service Provider
blurb: Integrated service provider of ornamental fish.
description: Qian Hu Fish Farm Trading is one an integrated “one-stop” service provider ranging from farming, importing, exporting and distributing of ornamental fish. There are also Seafood retail areas at the farm. One of the most successful local farming business, Qian Hu Fish Farm also have recreational and play areas such as the Traditional Long Kang Fishing Experience and visitors can also have a guided tour when visiting. The farm offers a unique opportunity to learn about the ornamental fish industry and see the various stages of fish farming. Visitors can also enjoy recreational activities such as the Traditional Long Kang Fishing Experience.
datetime_display: Daily operations are run by the 3rd & 4th generation of the family, including Mr Wong Kok Fah and his three brothers who took over from their father in 1979

title: Bollywood Farms: Countryside Surprises and Excitement
blurb: A farm full of surprises, excitement, and great fun!
description: Bollywood Farms, formerly known as Bollywood Veggies, started in 2000. The farm offers a range of surprises, excitement, and fun activities. It provides a unique countryside experience with a focus on local friendships and wider options. Visitors can explore the farm and enjoy the various offerings, making it a great destination for those seeking a fun and engaging experience. The farm is designed to be full of surprises and excitement, providing a memorable experience for all visitors. It's a place where families and friends can come together to enjoy the countryside.

title: Orchidville: Premium Orchids and Event Management
blurb: International orchid exporter with restaurant and event facilities.
description: Orchidville is a leading international exporter of premium quality commercial orchids with extensive distribution networks. In addition to orchids, Orchidville has expanded into the Food and Beverage industry with its own restaurant, Forrest, located on the premises. It also offers expertise in Event Management, providing facilities for conferences, events, and functions. Orchidville combines the beauty of orchids with dining and event services, making it a unique destination for various occasions. Visitors can enjoy the serene environment and explore the diverse offerings available.

title: Sungei Buloh Wetland Reserve Experience Nature
blurb: Discover nature's beauty at Singapore’s first ASEAN park.
description: Explore the rich biodiversity of Sungei Buloh Wetland Reserve, Singapore’s first ASEAN Heritage Park. Wander through the wetlands and an extensive mangrove forest. Originally opened as a Nature Park in 1993, 130 hectares were gazetted as a Nature Reserve in 2002. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts, the reserve offers a unique opportunity to observe diverse flora and fauna in their natural habitat. Enjoy bird watching, guided walks, and educational exhibits suitable for all ages. Discover the wonders of the natural world in this serene and protected environment. A great place for kids to learn about nature.

title: GardenAsia / Nyee Phoe Enjoy the Countryside
blurb: One-stop venue to enjoy dining, nursery, and farm stay!
description: GardenAsia / Nyee Phoe is a one-stop venue offering dining, a nursery, an amazing visitor center, farm-styled accommodation, event spaces, and Instagrammable spots. The Kranji Countryside Farmers Market, one of the most authentic and largest farmers markets, is regularly held here. Perfect for families looking for a countryside experience, GardenAsia provides a range of activities and amenities suitable for all ages. Enjoy the natural surroundings, explore the farm, and participate in various events. A great place for kids to learn about farming and nature.

title: GardenAsia / Nyee Phoe Venue for Countryside Fun
blurb: Enjoy dining, nursery, farm stay, and event spaces!
description: GardenAsia offers a one-stop venue to enjoy the countryside with dining, a nursery, an amazing visitor center, farm-styled accommodation, and event spaces. There are even "instagrammable" spots. The Kranji Countryside Farmers market, one of the most authentic and largest farmers markets, is regularly held here. It's a great place for families to enjoy a day out in nature, explore the gardens, and participate in farm-related activities. The venue is suitable for all ages, offering a relaxing and educational experience for everyone. Perfect for families looking for a unique and engaging outing.

title: Hay Dairies Goat Farm: Singapore's Only Goat Farm
blurb: Visit Singapore's only goat farm since 1988!
description: Hay Dairies is Singapore's only goat farm since 1988, with over 800 goats of mixed breed from Minnesota, United States. Farm tours are available, and you can purchase fresh goat milk during your visit. It's a great place for families to learn about goat farming and interact with the animals. The farm offers an educational experience for children and adults alike, providing insights into the dairy farming process. Perfect for families looking for a unique and engaging outing. Suitable for all ages, offering a fun and educational experience for everyone.

title: Plants n Pints - The Jungle Market Experience
blurb: A community nursery bringing people home to nature!
description: The Jungle Market by Plants n Pints is a community nursery that aims to bring people home to nature. Besides plants, there are many things to see and experience at the Jungle Market, including "Instagrammable" spots. It's a great place for families to explore nature and discover new plants. The market offers a relaxing and educational experience for children and adults alike, providing insights into the plant world. Perfect for families looking for a unique and engaging outing. Suitable for all ages, offering a fun and educational experience for everyone.

Besides plants, there are much to see and experience at the Jungle Market. You will also be able to find some really good "Instagrammable" spots here. Welcome to the Jungle indeed! title: Chengtai Nursery - Bonsai Garden Experience Here
blurb: A one-stop horticulture service supplier to visit!
description: Chengtai Nursery is a one-stop horticulture service supplier with decades of experience and their bonsai garden area is really a place not to be missed. Some of the stone sculptures in the nursery also have stories to tell and a visit here is a definite when in the Kranji Countryside. Filled with beautiful plants and flowers, spots here make for very good "instagram" shots too! Chengtai Nursery is a one-stop horticulture service supplier with decades of experience and their bonsai garden area is really a place not to be missed.

title: Kranji War Cemetery & Memorial in Singapore
blurb: Final resting place for Allied soldiers. Visit today!
description: The Kranji War Cemetery in Kranji, Singapore, serves as the final resting place for Allied soldiers who died during the Battle of Singapore and the subsequent Japanese occupation from 1942 to 1945, as well as in other parts of Southeast Asia during World War II. Adjacent to it is the State Cemetery of Singapore, where you can find the grave of a past President of Singapore. A place of remembrance and reflection on Singapore's history and the sacrifices made during the war.
